title: Bucket of slime

properties.name: description
properties.value: Buckets of slime are filled with a slimy green glowing liquid, found in an underground basement near Port Phasmatys. Necrovarus uses this liquid to control the ghosts of Port Phasmatys, but he is thwarted by the player during Ghosts Ahoy. It apparently has hidden magical properties regarding ghosts and the undead, which is the reason Necrovarus can control the ghosts of Phasmatys and also why he, along with his disciples, are still able to interact with living beings, even after many years of death.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bucket of slime
Bucket of slime
Released15 February 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo

ExamineIt's a bucket of ectoplasm.
Values

High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight3 kg
Advanced data
Item ID4286

Buckets of slime are filled with a slimy green glowing liquid, found in an underground basement near Port Phasmatys. Necrovarus uses this liquid to control the ghosts of Port Phasmatys, but he is thwarted by the player during Ghosts Ahoy. It apparently has hidden magical properties regarding ghosts and the undead, which is the reason Necrovarus can control the ghosts of Phasmatys and also why he, along with his disciples, are still able to interact with living beings, even after many years of death.

They are used along with bonemeal to worship the Ectofuntus for training Prayer. If bones are ground and used with ectoplasm to worship the Ectofuntus, four times the normal amount of experience for the bones is given; which makes it a useful item that greatly impacts and cheapens training Prayer.

Contents

  • 1 Obtaining Ectoplasm
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Shop locations
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 5 Trivia

Obtaining Ectoplasm[edit | edit source]

Teleport straight to the slime pit with Morytania legs.

Ectoplasm can be obtained by using a empty bucket on the pool of slime underneath the Ectofuntus.

It is also sold by a Trader Crewmember at any Charter ship location, such as south of the bank in Catherby or in Port Phasmatys. They stock 10, and sell for 2gp ea. Worldhopping and banking here may be faster than using the pool of slime.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

You can now obtain buckets of slime by giving bones to Robin after you complete Morytania Diaries:

  • 13 per day for the medium diary.
  • 26 per day for the hard diary.
  • 39 per day for the elite diary.
22 March 2006
(update)

The item was graphically updated.

4 October 2005 –
7 February 2006

An "Empty" option was added.

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The ghosts that inhabit Port Phasmatys are actually made of ectoplasm, as are mythical spirits.
  • Ectoplasm is a term used in spiritualism to descibe spiritual energy or substance that is external to living creatures or physical objects.
